title: Hassan Taher Examines MIT's Alarming Discovery About AI's Effect on Human Cognition
description: Artificial intelligence has become ubiquitous across educational institutions and professional environments, with millions relying on tools like ChatGPT for daily tasks. Yet a groundbreaking MIT study released in June 2025 reveals concerning implications for human cognitive function that demand immediate attention. title: Anthropic supports California's AI safety bill despite pushback from many in tech world
description: Amazon-backed Anthropic has signaled its support for California's SB 53, which calls for strict rules regarding the release of artificial intelligence models, despite pushback against the measure from most big tech companies and the Trump Administration.

title: Fat Joe Says Lawyer Used AI to Write Legal Briefs In Extortion Lawsuit
description: Fat Joe accused lawyers for hypeman Terrance “T.A.” Dixon of sloppily using artificial intelligence to write legal briefs in their ongoing lawsuit.

title: China Unveils Plan To Accelerate Integration Of AI With Energy Sector
description: China on Monday unveiled a new plan to accelerate the integration of artificial intelligence with the energy sector to achieve breakthroughs in key technologies such as data, computing power and algorithms.
content:

title: AI voice agents helped improve accuracy of blood pressure measurements in older adults

title: AI is shaking up call centers, but they aren't hanging up on human agents yet
description: Artificial intelligence is transforming call centers by streamlining tasks and improving customer service. Still, there is a place for for higher skilled human agents.
